about_the_game:
Can you beat the King's trials and persuade him to give his daughter away in marriage?

The Suitor offers a role-playing experience where there are no right or wrong choices. However, your decisions will affect your personal story and eventually where you will end up.

As a low-born, you decide to take your chances and answer the King's call to become a suitor for his daughter. Will you be able to outwit high-born lords? Will you let the King step into your mind to prove your worth? Will you manage to escape your past?

Use intimidation, diplomacy, cunning or magic on your way to becoming a royal. Beat unusual trials, face many horrors, and remember: Always mind your manners at the dinner table.

  • Decide what kind of a trickster you will be: Choose between different skills to customize your character and make decisions to seal both your and the kingdom's fate.
  • No wrong choices, but they will have consequences (Whether big or small, immediate or delayed)
  • Unravel the mystery and the lore around the Royal family and how they became to power.
  • Meet different love interests (including the King's daughter, the Royal Princess)
  • Different endings.

content_descriptors.notes: The Suitor contains strong language, violence, blood, non-explicit sexual content and themes that can be triggering for some people (abuse & trauma)

detailed_description:
Can you beat the King's trials and persuade him to give his daughter away in marriage?

The Suitor offers a role-playing experience where there are no right or wrong choices. However, your decisions will affect your personal story and eventually where you will end up.

As a low-born, you decide to take your chances and answer the King's call to become a suitor for his daughter. Will you be able to outwit high-born lords? Will you let the King step into your mind to prove your worth? Will you manage to escape your past?

Use intimidation, diplomacy, cunning or magic on your way to becoming a royal. Beat unusual trials, face many horrors, and remember: Always mind your manners at the dinner table.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0

name: The Suitor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Beat the King's trials to marry his daughter. Use diplomacy, cunning or magic on your way to becoming a royal. Endure bizarre tests, face many horrors, and always mind your manners.
